text: Rocket Punch () is a six-member South Korean girl group under Woollim Entertainment. The group consists of members Juri, Yeonhee, Suyun, Yunkyoung, Sohee and Dahyun. The group was announced in July 2019 and debuted on August 7, 2019 with their first extended play Pink Punch.Rocket Punch Concept FilmRocket Punch (로켓펀치) Shooting Teaser 이정범 기자 - [단독] '쥬리부터 소희까지'…로켓펀치, 8월 7일 전격 데뷔 ==History== ===Pre-debut=== Juri was cast as an AKB48 12th-generation trainee through an audition in 2011. She was introduced to the public through AKB48 Team 4 in March 2012. Her first television appearance in Korea was in the 2018 reality competition show, Produce 48. Suyun and Sohee were introduced to the public as representative trainees of Woollim Entertainment through Produce 48 as well. In March 2019, Juri was confirmed to have signed with Woollim Entertainment to pursue her career in Korea by debuting as a member of the company's new girl group. [단독 '프로듀스48' 타카하시 쥬리, 韓 걸그룹 데뷔…울림과 전속계약] '프듀48' 다카하시 쥬리, 울림엔터와 계약…걸그룹 데뷔 예정 [공식입장] Two months later, Juri officially graduated from AKB48. On July 22, Woollim Entertainment released a motion clip of Rocket Punch's logo and there was speculation that it would be a new girl group. Woollim Entertainment then confirmed it with a concept film released on July 23 which included the six members. 울림 새 걸그룹 '로켓펀치', 데뷔 초읽기 Rocket Punch became Woollim Entertainment’s second girl group since Lovelyz, who debuted in 2014. ===2019: Debut with Pink Punch=== Rocket Punch's debut EP Pink Punch was released on August 7, 2019, with "Bim Bam Bum" serving as its lead single. 2019 하반기 최대 기대주’ 로켓펀치, 7일 정식 데뷔 A debut showcase was held in Yes24 Live Hall in Seoul, South Korea, following the release of their EP. [포토;뷰] 로켓펀치 러블리즈 여동생 그룹 데뷔 [N현장] 로켓펀치 "울림 새 걸그룹 부담? 러블리즈 응원 덕 자신감" The group held their first performance in Japan at the 2019 Girls Award Autumn/Winter Show. ===2020: Comeback with Red Punch and Blue Punch=== The group made their comeback on February 10, 2020 with their second EP Red Punch and its lead single "Bouncy". 로켓펀치, 2월10일 컴백 확정...‘레드 펀치(RED PUNCH)’ 컴백 이미지 기습 공개 로켓펀치, 2월 10일 컴백…새 앨범 티저 공개 [공식] 로켓펀치, 두 번째 미니앨범 '레드 펀치(RED PUNCH)' 오늘(10일) 발매 On August 4, the group returned with their third EP Blue Punch and its lead single "Juicy". 로켓펀치, 8월 4일 컴백…여름 시즌송 예고 ==Members== * Juri (쥬리) * Yeonhee (연희) — Leader * Suyun (수윤) * Yunkyoung (윤경) * Sohee (소희) * Dahyun (다현) ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of extended plays, with selected details, chart positions and sales !
